thread.section_title: Mikes Dive Store Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of mikesdivestore.com
thread.title: James Hill
thread.title_full: Mikes Dive Store reviewed by James Hill

author: James Hill
title: James Hill
text: Good price on the suit I wanted and very quick delivery. It did not fit so I dropped it back at the shop and was dealt with in a very efficient and speedy way. The gentleman who served me was able to suggest the correct size from looking at me and offered some tips for maintaining the suit. If you can visit I would strongly recommend doing so as there is an impressive array of stock.
